method: Cook the transparent rice according to the package instructions and let it cool.
Place a sheet of luminous nori on a bamboo sushi mat.
Spread a layer of transparent rice on the nori, leaving a small border at the top.
Arrange thin slices of glistening salmon, shimmering tuna, and sparkling avocado on top of the rice.
Roll up the sushi tightly using the bamboo mat.
Repeat the process with the remaining ingredients.
Slice the sushi rolls into bite-sized pieces using a sharp knife.
Serve the spectacular sushi rolls with a side of radiant soy sauce for dipping.
